metadata.title: CVE-2014-9970 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
jasypt before 1.9.2 allows a timing attack against the password hash comparison.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2014-9970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasypt-java - 1.9.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasypt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1').
